preface.title: Course Introduction
preface.para: Welcome students and provide an orientation to the class, classroom hardware, and facility or VT environment.

section.title: Presentation Notes
section.para: Introduce yourself and welcome students to the class. Before starting make sure any operational requirements, including taking attendance and providing students with materials, have been met. For an in-person training event, orient students to the facility. Make sure students know the classroom hours and plans for any rest breaks and lunch.
Discuss the basic structure of the course and course timing with the students.

section.title: Objectives
section.para: Introduce your students to the main objectives of this course.

section.title: Audience and Prerequisites
section.para: Discuss the intended audience and prerequisites for this course.
